text: Hello. have you ever heard about Save the Children charity?
It sounds familiar.
Save the Children is a global charity helps children in 120 countries.
What kinds of support do they provide?
Well last year alone they helped approx 155 million children globally  and helped to provide healthy start in life, the opportunity to learn and protection from harm.
That sounds great.
You can purchase a gift to send though the gift catalog ranging from medical kits to livestock or you can choose to sponsor a child. Is that something you would be interested in?
Maybe. How much do the gifts cost? Would more than one person sponsor one child?

Well there are a variety of gifts you can choose from a soccer ball at $15 to animals for an entire village for $5000. There are a ton of gifts to choose from including small livestock, bicycles, blankets, medical care, clean water kits. How much of an impact would you like to make on a child?
I can't really afford to donate much, and I would like to research the charity before I make a choice.
Of course.  Save the Children is an amazing charity. It helps children domestically as well as internationally each year.
Charity Navigator seems to agree, for the most part. Can I make a straight donation and have it go wherever it's needed?
Well you can choose to donate right now from $0 to $2. Your donation will be deducted from your task payment. How much would you like to donate?
All of it. $2
That is so amazing of you. Rest assured that the research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
I'm glad I could help, even if it's not much.
Every little bit helps a child in need.
That's true. Have a good day.
Thank you again. Have a great day as well.
I don't know how to end the chat.
